trans-unit.source: File extensions associated to the language.
trans-unit.target: 与语言关联的文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: File names associated to the language.

trans-unit.source: A regular expression matching the first line of a file of the language.

trans-unit.source: A relative path to a file containing configuration options for the language.
trans-unit.target: 包含语言配置选项的文件的相对路径。

trans-unit.source: property `{0}` is mandatory and must be of type `string`
